title: Trump crypto ventures generate $350 million through March 2025
summary: Financial Times analysis finds Trump's crypto projects netted $350 million through March 2025, with $314 million from direct sales and $36 million in fees, while roughly half of top TRUMP holders received coins from exchanges rejecting U.S. customers.

sources.title: Trump's World Liberty Financial crypto project says it sold $550 million in tokens
Trump family's net worth has increased by $2.9 billion thanks to crypto investments, new report says

notes: Twenty-eight ghost wallets among top purchasers remain virtually untraceable
